website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, multi-tier organizer with enough space for all your fishing tackle. Hands down the best choice for the serious fishing enthusiast.
pros: More than just a tackle box - a complete organizing system w/sturdy construction and ample space ( 22" x 13" x 13")
Bulk storage area, 4 removable trays, 3 bait racks
cons: Somewhat bulky and heavy, especially when full

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heavy Duty Tackle Box
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid boater, fishermen, and have two nice tackle boxes, but wanted to go to ONE large tackle box. .. Well, I found it in this HUGE compartmentalized tackle box .. .. It's one of the more expensive Plano Boxes, but will hold everything I own. From my assortment of lures, hooks, weights, floats, knives, and all my other cool items .. .. I recommend this Plano 7771 Series Box, if you need mucho space. And, when full, it weighs a ton !! .. Arrived in perfect shape .. .. Go for it fellow anglers .. .. Frank Lombardo, Benicia, California 94510 .. .. .. 🏠
customer_reviews.author: Frank`Lombardo`

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box, but what is or isn't included wasn't clear.
customer_reviews.text: To be clear, this item includes only the 4, large, slide-in trays, and the various dividers. None of the other small organizers are included, nor is the box within the compartment on the bottom right. If you're expecting what you see in the picture, you're going to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John & Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Tackle Box with plenty of storage!!!! Honestly the box is WAY BIGGER than I thought. Maybe a little overpriced but definitely worth it I guess we'll see overtime! But as of right now I will recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.DUB

customer_reviews.title: Good sized but some things I have issues with
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this particular tackle box, with me, is that the latches are way too close together; opening and/or closing one section or another can be irritating since it seems like a top or bottom latch will be hindered by the other top or bottom latch. I'm not too crazy about some of the engineering of the box either especially some of the compartments. I still have a couple of my Plano tackle boxes from when I was a kid so I am expecting this one to hold up just as well as it appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: uncle jessie

customer_reviews.title: Boat and bank fishing box. Great size. Great organization. Falls short on a few things.
customer_reviews.text: Why I'm keeping it: I like the organization. I like the size. The handle feels good and I think it's going to do the job just fine. I expect problems with the latches and lid (Also didn't come with all the boxes needed). I expected a higher quality product. Snaps/ latches are not to expectations. I've always heard plano was the top choice for pros. I'm not impressed at all. For $80 I was hoping for a better designed product. I'm keeping it but I'll be on the lookout for a replacement in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Si

customer_reviews.title: All I could want in an electronics toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a fisherman, but this tackle box makes an awesome toolbox! four bin trays for sorting out LED's capacitors, resistors and other fun things, an inner storage area for tools with a side area that is big enough to hold my soldering station. The top bins are good for more things like glue, rosin, soldering iron tips, solder sucker and lithium grease. And there is one more front access area big enough for a larger multi-meter and a little bit more. This is a major upgrade from my previous box.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: I've finally found the one!
customer_reviews.text: I've been freshwater fishing for 50 years and have finally found the tacklebox I've been looking for. This box has it all. Plenty of storage, designed for fishing off a boot, and has room to carry everything you'd need. A single lid eliminates having to open butterfly lids. Spinner bait racks, four clear boxes, and more. If you have more stuff than this will hold, you need to get rid of the stuff. Designed and built to take a pounding, this box looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great organization capacity
customer_reviews.text: After I finish loading this tackle box with my stuff, and still am missing things I need, I think I should get another hobby other than fishing. This box will hold a ridiculous amount of well organized tackle. I can already tell it is going to be heavier than a Sherman Tank by the time I'm done. Highly recommended. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: hlj3

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty heavy. Removed 1 star for clear top
customer_reviews.text: NOTE: IT'S BIG. Once loaded with weights and tackle, it's pretty heavy. Removed 1 star for clear top, anything in the top roasts in the sun. I should have known not to put any bottles up there, exploded a sun tan lotion bottle and hand sanitizer. Line clippers were too hot to touch after baking in the top. Spray painted the inside for better protection, drastically improved issue. Good quality overall and the 4 included trays and separators hold a ton of gear.
customer_reviews.author: RedBaron057

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked at least one of the removable boxes had a ...
customer_reviews.text: I just loaded with my gun cleaning items. I researched carefully the available tackle boxes and found that this one meets my needs very well. I would have liked it if at least one of the removable boxes had a couple wide rows but I'll probably cut one of the rows down/out in order to fit some of my wider items. In any case, all working quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: friulboy

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: This box is huge if you plan on carrying your takelbox then I would look for a smaller one but if your looking for one to stay on the boat and want to be able to store all your lures then this is the best box hands down. This box is well built with great storage drawers and a big door that can hold big rolls of fishing line or your wallet,cellphone,and keys.
customer_reviews.author: terry stewart

customer_reviews.title: seems very sturdy and this has a ton of room and options.
customer_reviews.text: you will want to pick up the extra trays for the top compartment as it doesn't come with them. the unit latches securely and has a ton of room. the only problem is if you fully load it up, it will get very heavy as it holds a lot! I am impressed with the design, and the functionality. A real winner in design.
customer_reviews.author: Warriorpoet

customer_reviews.title: Bought for plumbing kit
customer_reviews.text: I stock all my fittings copper, pex, and clamps in the drawer pullouts, glue and pastes in the bottom right deep channel, and my bigger snips, clamp pliers, and cutters under the hood. Miscellaneous fittings up top like shark bite caps. The top side container I used for my clamps, and shutoffs
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: King of tackle stowage boxes, tons of room
customer_reviews.text: Luckily this was not damaged in transit, very poor packing. Stores A lot of stuff, I added from my own collection of tackle stowage trap 3 to the right side. ( I think Plano should provide then) Shop around for the best price, $ 50-80, watch your pennies. Yep very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Go Box
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing all my Dungeons and Dragons stuff. The white boxes are good for miniatures. The top area is great for pencils. The top lid is good for dice rolling trays. The right side is perfect for dice. Taking out a few white boxes leaves room for books. It is a little on the heavy side (even empty).
customer_reviews.author: Bamatick

customer_reviews.title: **Nice unit but poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit about a month ago. Nice product but was missing a couple components. I tried contacting Plano customer service through their email (twice) but never received a response. I tried calling them directly which took me several attempts. When I finally talked to a "service representative", they refused to send me the missing items and said I needed to pay for them even though they were advertised as part of the tackle box system. BOOO!! Buyer beware. Will be sending it back and going with a different brand. Too bad :(
customer_reviews.author: Jason V.

customer_reviews.title: my favorite tackle box
customer_reviews.text: finally a box I can fit all my tackle in for Canada trips. its a little bulky/heavy but I use it as the warehouse and operate mainly out of the smaller boxes. the boxes that are included and some smaller yet that I added. the smaller boxes fit nicely in the compartment which also will hold spinnerbait box. well thought out with room to customize to your liking in comparision with others I've had impressive amount of space under the lid for bulky stuff
customer_reviews.author: willy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is an electrical engineer so he has a lot of little wires and pieces and he's outgrowing the box he has. This one has so many little compartments, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dheanna Konicki

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!  Don’t waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk and I couldn’t have been more disappointed. I ordered this box and was very excited to see it arrive today. When I opened it, a pin was missing from the hinge and the clear, plastic top was not working properly either. Called Plano as suggested by Amazon.....yeah, good luck there! Bottom line, don’t waste your time on this junk and don’t expect anything from Plano.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Little

customer_reviews.title: Delivered with a cracked lid.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it yet but I like the design. Good storage. Only problem is that it showed up with a cracked lid that I didn't notice until I spent an hour+ filling the trays.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas and hatches are broken already. Only 2 months have passed, this is the last time for me. I have bought this company a few times and it's the same story.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good size and lots of compartments.
customer_reviews.text: Again this was given as a gift. They said they really liked it, but was going to have to add on room to their fishing boat. It had a lot of different compartments and seemed to be well made. The top compartment he used for his most popular items. Easy to get to, and could see at a glance it the item was there.
customer_reviews.author: Mrfixit

customer_reviews.title: Great box but drawers are only 1” high & limited on divisibility.
customer_reviews.text: Great. This is my 2nd one. Only complaint is wish the 4 pull out drawers were 3750’s boxes. by changing that would only raise the overall height by 1-1.5”. This would not make the tackle box tippy as it is so wide & deep. The 3750 boxes are so popular & I have several. Would make changing boxes back & forth really easy. The standard boxes that come with it are only 1” high. Bigger items & plugs don’t fit well. Standard box is not divisible like the standard 3750 & that is really handy. Make those changes & you'll have the perfect tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: fred w. reykdal

customer_reviews.title: Bad latch system
customer_reviews.text: The glaring flaw on this tackle box are the two latches on top and bottom. They are so close together that it’s actually difficult to latch the bottom compartment. You cannot do it with one hand. I’m shocked at the people who designed this. That flaw alone is worth not buying.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: I use this box to carry some of my fly ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this box to carry some of my fly tying gadgets and materials. Downside is that you have to make sure the top compartment (where I carry spools of tying thread ) is thoroughly locked or else when the next section is opened the top compartment will open spilling its contents.
customer_reviews.author: John Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Using this for SST Hardware
customer_reviews.text: This box is amazing. Fully loaded, I've cleaned up about 100 bags of marine hardware, including all of my bolts, nuts, washers, specialty fasteners, crimp-clamps. But wait, there's more! Because of the size of the larger compartments, I have a welding iron, full sized fluke meter, LED flashlight, specialty electronic pliers, and solder in the front left compartment. Up above that particular compartment are things such as teflon tape, loctite, specialty screwdrivers, etc... Thank you to whomever read my mind on making this box. edit: 7 years later the box was going strong... until I ran it over with the truck. Purchasing the EXACT same box. It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Floaty.

customer_reviews.title: The queen bee of fishing boxes
customer_reviews.text: Amazing box. Its the Space Shuttle of fishing boxes! Room for everything short of the net, it has a huge capacity. Its a big box, so it should be used as the Mother Ship, and have a smaller one for the boat. You can also opt to take one of the four trays with you inside a smaller carrier.
customer_reviews.author: John Neary Anker

customer_reviews.title: Big box. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.text: Big box. Plenty of room for whatever you might need. Only issue was the very top clear cover/lid didn't close properly on the right side. (It didn't click.)That made me weary of all the things in my top section possibly coming out every time I open the upper section. Small issue but important. Would given 5 stars if it wasn't for that.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah C.

customer_reviews.title: Carries it all
customer_reviews.text: Carries it all. I have had several Plano products over the years and believe I still have everyone of them in good working order. I went fishing with my dad this summer and he had one like this. Really like the ease of getting to lures without opening the whole tackle box. Plenty of storage room. I have a lot of gear and was able to pack it in the storage trays and still have a couple for future extras. Overall I am very pleased and would recommend this. Although keep in mind it is fairly large. This is better suited for a short walk or for a boat.
customer_reviews.author: John Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Too pretty to use.
customer_reviews.text: Way impressed with the quality of this box. Well thought out design, plenty of room, fit and finish is superb. Almost too pretty to take fishing knowing it's going to get beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Large enough to store plenty of supply’s and is very sturdy. I have used several times and so far it has held up very well. Will be my go to tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage, god awful stickers.
customer_reviews.text: The worst part about this tackle box is the huge sticker on the front that won't come off. If you like keeping things clean looking, this box will bother you. Its bigger than i thought and a bit heavy but definitely fits a bunch of your tackle.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Taper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tackle box!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very big tackle box and can get very heavy when fully loaded. However, I use this box to store all of my fishing tackle (fresh and salt water) and then when I go fishing I only get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar M.

customer_reviews.title: Works for Lego's
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to sort Lego Architecture sets with lots of small pieces and so far it's working out well. Pros: BIG, Lots of room to store small items, One deep section that can be sectioned off, keeps things organized well. Cons: Heavy - Because it's so big, it's heavy, even without anything inside. At the time of my purchase, the picture showed the smaller width trays in the bottom right section. It wasn't clear in the description that you had to order them separately and these were not included in the Amazon "Ordered Together".
customer_reviews.author: K.Day

customer_reviews.title: Big, but Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to store my electronic supplied (Arduinos, sensors, etc.). The case is fantastic for that purposes. I'm not sure I would use this as a tackle box, however. The case is 100% plastic, and much of it looks brittle -- I doubt that the case could survive being dropped. (I'm surprised it arrived undamaged as it was packed in an over-sized box without any padding.)
customer_reviews.author: Mondial1984

customer_reviews.title: AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with a specific goal in mind. It was not for fishing. I fly RC Helicopters and the amount of parts, tools and specialized items can easily get out of hand. I had 3 different fishing tool boxes before. I needed to have my equipment better organized. After researching many fishing type box manufacturers, I found the Piano 7771 Tackle Box perfect for for my needs. I was able to put all my equipment in one place, have it organized, and have extra space to grow. The quality and flexibility of this item is, as advertised. I have recommended it to many of my RC helicopter club members.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Diskin

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed hinges
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice tackle box except for the hinge stops on the large lid. I was transferring things over from my old tackle box when I noticed the stops built into the hinges would not support the weight of the empty lid. I could tell that if this happened enough it would eventually break the rear of the box. I made a catch out of some 100 lb leader and fastened it to prevent the lid from going to far. Otherwise this is a great box
customer_reviews.author: my 1st review

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great fish box, holds a lot of fish related things. Love the easy access top flap. Easy to access doors and boxes work great, love taking when going trout fishing at the lake or beach fishing! Would recommend for any beginner or expert!
customer_reviews.author: BakoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Huge storage!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? This is one sweet tackle box. I bought it to upgrade my cramped what I thought was a big Plano #620034 box and holy moly! I can't even fill 2 trays plus I've got the top full of bass lures and the hanger racks I'm only using 1. The storage compartment is spacious and my tools and scale etc fit with extra room. This is a great buy with tons of room
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Torrance

customer_reviews.title: No more mess!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tackle box for lots of stuff. Each compartment has plenty of room for my lures or other items. This box replaced three other ones easily.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Missing dividers and hangers..........
customer_reviews.text: I was going to try and get them but thought forget it! It should have been there and another customer was missing them too and had a hard time to get them. It is a large box.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but holds lots of tackle
customer_reviews.text: Fishing/primary tackle box. It is very heavy once loaded, but holds lots of tackle. The slide out boxes are great. I bought on sale for half the list price, so I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Missing Inserts😡
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality and capacity. Only disappointment was the missing spinnerbaits insert and upper tray dividers. Plano was unresponsive to my request for replacement. I would be willing to purchase them to complete my set-up,but, believe they are owed. Are these, offered through Amazon, factory seconds or returned retail sales that have had the inserts remove?
customer_reviews.author: Keith, Indianapolis, IN

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Box to store all your fishing tackle in one place.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to organize all you fishing tackle and be able find it very easy. The Tackle box appears to be bulky, but it is very easy to transport to the fishing site.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Scott

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space 777-1 plano great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Plano 777-1. The first my wife uses for her cake decorating business, the second which I just purchased recently since I liked hers so much was used to expand the space for our fishing tackle. These are well built, durable, and simple boxes that hold up well. The second one I ordered came missing a piece, I called Plano on Friday night that I opened the box and received a call back first thing Monday morning. First class service! Quality of the product: Excellent Quality of service: Excellent
customer_reviews.author: 4pierre

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this tackle box/system to be used as a way to store spare parts/tools for my various radio control vehicles. I will say, it's much larger than I anticipated, but in the end, it is absolutely perfect. I don't see myself running out of room in this thing for years. Extra organizer trays are easy to find and I could even fit a few more of the smaller ones in the top than it comes with. This is my first experience with Plano and I can say with absolute certainty, I will be a customer again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room. Annoying latch system
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this box because I wanted to pack most of my tackle into one box. This box provides storage for crank baits, spinner baits, soft plastics, terminal tackle and a variety of other equipment. The box is quite heavy when fully loaded and quite large. My only complaint is the latching system. There are latches that hold down the upper compartment lid and latches that keep the plastic closure over the tackle trays closed. These sets of latches sometimes get in the way of each other making it difficult to latch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Good tackle box; some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, large tackle box. As other reviewers have noted, it does not contain all of the internal storage compartments pictured and is brown, not grey. Also, the internal storage it does contain, both built into the box and the included removable containers, are not assembled - individual plastic tabs must be folded/cut and inserted into all of slots in order to create any compartmentalized storage. Not a huge deal, but a bit of a pain. All in all, satisfied. Holds all of my tackle with room to spare, and appears well made so far.
customer_reviews.author: AngryFraggle

customer_reviews.title: nice box
customer_reviews.text: excellent storage space. It's the best box I could find for the money. very organized set up of storage bins for fast access.
customer_reviews.author: William Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Good for back of car or truck
customer_reviews.text: No great to carry long ways, but good to have in your car or truck. Keeps everything in place and sorted, solid for anyone who goes after many species of fish. If you only go for bass then maybe get a smaller box.
customer_reviews.author: NameIdeas

customer_reviews.title: 7771 Tackle Box holds everything you want to take with you.
customer_reviews.text: The Plano 7771 Guide Series Tackle System is a larger than average tackle box. My system was not as pictured here at Amazon however. The top access is oriented differently, with smaller compartments than shown and system was short two boxes that I had to order after I received it. The latches on the utility boxes keep falling off, lost one in the water and the box is heavy when loaded. Having said all that I love this system. It holds everything I need to take with me except the rod and reels. The top and front access make everything convenient to get to.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for salt water
customer_reviews.text: It holds the gear I had in two older boxes...I really like the layout
customer_reviews.author: sean martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and cheaper on Amazoni
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these tackle boxes. The first one was stolen. The second one I have used for 10 years. This one is going to my sons. Great product. Battle tested. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift to my son. He called and said he really loved it and it was so big
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wylie

customer_reviews.title: try another box.
customer_reviews.text: holds bait, however cracked pretty much first week so the top lid does not stay closed, the hinges are placed horribly so they are hard to close as well. plano makes great boxes, this is just a horrible design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice extra large box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fathers day gift for my husband who had many boxes so he could consolidate. He loves it. There was plenty of room for all of his things. Its a bit heavy fully loaded. Only thing I could say bad is the front slide out boxes tend to slip out if you aren't careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: First tackle box was missing the plastic inserts. The second tacklebox, Second time I use it I had the lid crack on me. I’m told they no longer carry this one good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice big tackle box
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to return it due to missing parts, I believe this is a great tackle box...... a bit big for me but it is a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: Robertbfxd

customer_reviews.title: Great for Electronics Hobbyist Too
customer_reviews.text: Lots of nice resizable compartment to hold electronic components. The right hand side has two deeper compartments which are nice for holding larger items like soldering iron station, wire rolls, multi-meters, etc. I also found that for on-location work, I can easily slip a MacBook Pro into one of the tray holders (after removing the tray of course). Nice way to keep everything in one location for on-the-go physical computing.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Glau

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle box
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle box, can hold a ton of gear. It's hard to tell how big this thing from the pictures online, but it's huge. Pretty heavy so I would not recommend it if you have to carry it very far. Great for a boat though.
customer_reviews.author: Leahood

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and durable with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and roomy. Storage is amazing, inky thing I would change is where the locked are on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Best Tackle I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: The Plano 7771 is an amazing tackle box. First thing is that it's huge. If you can't fit everything you have in this, then you have way to much stuff. Mine only came with 1 little box and no spinnerbait box. But no problem I wouldn't of used it anyways. The spinnerbait racks and are very sturdy and strong. The 4 big boxes it comes with are very large and have plenty of space inside them. Can fit crankbaits and worms perfectly inside with no issue. I recommend this to anyone looking for a large tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Has lots of space
customer_reviews.text: This tackle box is a pretty good size. The pictures do not do it justice. I must say I'm very happy that I purchased this. It was able to hold all my gear that was in multiple smaller cases and then some. Whats also nice is the trays come out of the box completely. They also snap close. If I decide I'm going to be doing a lot of walking, I can just pull the trays out and put them in a backpack. Any fisherman would love this tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room. Well built
customer_reviews.text: This tackle box is huge has plenty of room . A little heavy but worth it. I purchased this for my son and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: J ace

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space
customer_reviews.text: Tons and tons of room! Lots of compartments to separate everything and some larger ones for bigger items
customer_reviews.author: Tknobby

customer_reviews.title: Best tackle box on the market
customer_reviews.text: I just received this tackle box after my old one finally had enough. To say that this is the best box I have ever owned is an understatement. The build quality is very good and it has many storage areas for everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tackle box. It holds way more than I thought it would and everything is easy to find. I had several other tackle boxes, you know, one for pan fish, one for bigger fish and one for realy big fish. Every time I went out, I had to decide which to take with me. Now I just take this one. The only problem is - what do I do with all those other (empty) boxes. :-) I would recommend this for anyone that loves to fish and loves to be organized.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L Czaplewski

customer_reviews.title: Switched from soft side to this.  Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I love the box except for one thing. The bottom tray can be very difficult to pull out. No way to get a grip on it and the door also interferes with you removing it when open. Like all the other features but bad design on the bottom tray.
customer_reviews.author: G. Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Best Tackle Box ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tackle box you can get for any type of fishing. It has many compartments for fishing lures, tools, towels, and anything else you may need. You can use it for saltwater fishing and fresh water fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Hiromi

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new house and this tackle box has a separate spot for each set of extras and plenty of room for more. Total time and space saver. No more need for a junk drawer. From small screws to headlamps to new product manuals, etc. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: plenty of storage and options
customer_reviews.text: this box can hold everything! the 4 removable drawers are awesome for a quick grab and go. throw in Planos Liqua-bait storage for your soft scented baits and it fits right in the top compartment with a little modification to the compartment (cutting out some extra unneeded plastic in the storage area). the front deep storage spot is perfect for storing spools of line/braid and will fit multiple spools.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyDanger454

customer_reviews.title: Put everything that u need and forget about the rest lol
customer_reviews.text: I need this. I need it. I have everything in here lol
customer_reviews.author: James Y. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage and stays dry inside
customer_reviews.text: After filling top lid full of lures I noticed hinges are kinda flimsy but keeps my tackle dry in the rain and lots of storage space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of storage!
customer_reviews.text: This box exceeded all expectations! I can finally sort all of my lures including my musky stuff
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Of ALL tackle boxes researched, this one proved to be the best!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for OCD fishermen who need to keep stuff organized. However, the more you stuff it full of fishing goodies, it's going to weigh a TON! I don't mind it, though, as I'm always ready with this fine tackle box for any type of fishing wherever and whenever!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Company not working on problems in product & don’t seem to care about customer input.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson. He loved it but it is heavy when filled. Also the Plano Company that I had messaged with a problem on our last tackle box wouldn’t return my message. Fasteners hard to open @ times also.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Robey

customer_reviews.title: handle keeps coming off parts keep falling off not a good product
customer_reviews.text: was not made with good quality its not durable at all
customer_reviews.author: Andre Ardoin

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle box
customer_reviews.text: Great Tackle box. Was what I was hoping for. I wanted a single place for tackle and be able to use it on fishing piers or the boat. Its a bit heavier than I' like, but has storage for everything​ I'd need.
customer_reviews.author: Woody D.

customer_reviews.title: seems like a great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based on the reviews, seems like a great, sturdy product, BUT I will be sending it back. My husband states that this box is too big to be useful for its intended purpose (fishing). It's too difficult to carry around and we do not have a boat to park it in at the moment. Pay attention to the dimentions so as not to be surprised by just how large this item actually is.
customer_reviews.author: ehmon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fishing box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my brother. He absolutely loves the storage capacity of this tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY Duty
customer_reviews.text: Very solid tackle box with lots of space. The drawer system allows you to have multiple inserts at home for different types of fishing, and you can load in the ones you need for each trip to the water. The only downside is that if you really load it up it can get a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its from Plano, its great.
customer_reviews.text: Plano makes great stuff. I had to pester the wife to order this. We were bringing bags of tackle with us. It was not cool. We have filled this and may need a second, but we're crazy. Most people will only need one, and it will not be filled. If you purchase every shiny lure you come across, this is perfect for you. And you can't beat the price. Add at least $20 is you are in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Will not last
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Didn’t even last 3 full months. The handle broke off and caused a friend to fall off the dock while we were taking it off the boat. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mento

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our son's birthday, well made, good price. He was pleased a side cavity was large enough to hold a couple of canned drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bosscawen

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle box to have
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tackle box! It’s not ideal for jumping spot to spot. But it’s great if you’re on a boat or to keep in your trunk and just stick the trays and stuff you need in a back pack if you go spot to spot. Almost bought a 2nd.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great more room then I need but I will try my best to fill it up
customer_reviews.author: lino

customer_reviews.title: Huge tackle box
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula

customer_reviews.title: Stores everything
customer_reviews.text: Love the trays to take with rather then whole box
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the absolute best tackle box I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the absolute best tackle box I have ever owned! This thing is rugged and tough. The construction on this tackle box is flawless. I have room for all of my hard and soft lures, fish killer, lip grip, 3 spools of line etc. and still have extra room for everything i need. And its lightweight too. All of my friends that I have suggested this box to all agree that this is the top notch tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Oh this is nice and cheaper than bass pro! Got lots of room. Even for a sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: M. COLE

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hold my board games, a lot of space and easy to carry,
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Does not include top hanging spinner bait racks or bottom 3504 worm and spinner bait box
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to the video shown with some Plano products, the top removable spinner bait racks and the bottom, right 3504 worm and spinner bait box are not included with your purchase. The picture is deceiving showing that the box is in there. The text is deceiving stating the top racks are included. This is a fine tackle box, but not hardly worth the expense without the additional storage. You can buy the extra box for about $11.00 plus shipping on Amazon, but who knows where you can find the top racks lol!
customer_reviews.author: Delta Dood

customer_reviews.title: Great general storage for gaming components
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for general storage for the components of the board game Descent: Journeys in the Dark Second Edition (and its many expansions). This container has been perfect for organizing the various components of different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing is well made and holds tons of stuff. It is well thought out, and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m really excited to have this tacklebox. The last Plano box I had is over 30 years old.
customer_reviews.author: HBC

customer_reviews.title: Another good Plano design.
customer_reviews.text: Great Plano construction. Well designed, a good bit of room, good flexibility in layout and dividers. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: organize your gear
customer_reviews.text: lots of storage, it is a bit heavy but well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps organize my gear but a little big and heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps organize my gear but a little big and heavy for anything you have a long walk for or are carrying other gear (chair, poles, icechest, lunchbag)
customer_reviews.author: Buenos Dias

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, mediocre layout.
customer_reviews.text: There's something so great about this, but flawed. If your'e like me, you have too much fishing gear. Yes I said it, and you know I'm right. This box is pretty big, and has tons of storage, but for some reason... I can never quite maximize the space, and make odd things fit. I don't hate the box... I just don't love it.
customer_reviews.author: QA Tester

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my husband. Everything fits and he can stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Plano 7771-01 Guide Series Tackle System, Premium Tackle Storage
product_meta.description: The Plano 7771 Guide Series Tackle Box includes four 2-3701 utility boxes, three top access removable spinnerbait racks, spacious bulk storage, top access, see-through Duraview cover, and over molded handle. Dimensions: 21-1/4" x 12" x 12". Made in USA.
feature_bullets: Includes Plano 4 utility system, Plano brochure, nameplate order form
Three removable bait racks with separate access

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
